distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for zziplib fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:    
- CVE-2018-16548: Prevented memory leak from __zzip_parse_root_directory().  Free allocated structure if its address is not passed back. (bsc#1107424)

Other issue addressed:
    
- Prevented a division by zero (bsc#1129403).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in ZZIPlib through 0.13.69. There is a memory leak triggered in the function __zzip_parse_root_directory in zip.c, which will lead to a denial of service attack.
notes.title: CVE description
